tool_description: Standardizes and validates date strings extracted from legal documents, handling multiple date formats and converting them to consistent ISO format.

raw_date_string.description: Raw date string to parse and standardize

expected_format.description: Expected date format pattern if known (e.g., MM/DD/YYYY)

error_messages: Invalid date format: The raw_date_string could not be parsed. Ensure it contains a recognizable date pattern.
Ambiguous date format: Multiple possible interpretations found. Specify expected_format to disambiguate.
Invalid timezone: The specified timezone is not recognized. Use standard timezone identifiers.
usage: Provide a raw_date_string from document text. Optionally specify expected_format if the format is known, and set timezone for proper date interpretation. Returns standardized ISO format date.

original_format.description: Detected format pattern of the input date

confidence.description: Confidence score (0-100) in the parsing accuracy
